This sweater is made with 100% traceable NATIVA™️ wool sourced from a transitional regenerative farm. Regenerative practices are super different from conventional methods, so it takes a lot of time, effort, and resources to make the switch. We think that regenerative is the future, so we’re excited to support it from the ground up with each sweater we make. Hand wash + dry flat.
